org.apache.jk.core

Class WorkerEnv

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jk.core.WorkerEnv

  • public class WorkerEnv
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller object. It manages all other jk objects, acting as the root of the jk object model.
    Author:
    Gal Shachor, Henri Gomez [hgomez@apache.org], Dan Milstein [danmil@shore.net], Keith Wannamaker [Keith@Wannamaker.org], Kevin Seguin, Costin Manolache
